events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection yesterday afternoon.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial claim details submitted by the customer.
An agent specializing in vehicle accidents was assigned to handle the case and assist with further processing.
We acknowledged receipt of the claim and informed the customer that processing will begin promptly to ensure quick resolution.
The customer was asked to provide a copy of the police report and photos of the vehicle damage for investigation purposes.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report, photos, and repair estimates to move forward with claim assessment.
The claims investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence to verify the accident circumstances and vehicle damage.
Investigation concluded confirming fault and validating the customerâ€™s claim for appropriate coverage under the policy.
A settlement offer was presented to the customer including repair costs and compensation for inconvenience caused by the accident.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the clarity of communication throughout the claim process.
The claim was officially approved by management after customer accepted the settlement terms and agreed on repair timelines.
Payment covering the vehicle repairs and approved settlement amount was issued to the customer promptly per policy guidelines.
The claim has been closed successfully following payment disbursement and confirmation that the repair works are underway.
All claim documents and records have been archived for future reference in compliance with company policy retention requirements.
